name: Bob Goes Mining!
description:
[CONTROLS]

Press [SPACE] to mine (tap the mine button at the top right on mobile)

Click the store item to buy the item

Store Prices:

Minion: $500 ($50 / 5s)

TNT Worker: $50,000  ($100 / 0.5s)

Faster Time Stopwatch: $500,000 (Faster Ore Speed, Faster Mining Speed)

Girlfriend: $9,999,999,999 ($100,000 / 2.5s)

Nether: $1,000,000,000,000 (Enter the Nether (One time Entrance))

Piglin Barter: $2,000 ($25 to $500 / 10s)

Netherite Miner: $50,000 ($100 / 1s)

Stock Marketer: $10,000 ($100 to $250 / 2.5s)

End: $50,000,000,000,000 (Enter the End (One time Entrance))

End Looter: $100,000 ($50,000 / 60s)

Upgrade Prices:

Level 1: Free

Level 2: $5,000

Level 3: $10,000

Level 4: $2,500,000

Level 5: $25,000,000,000
